data.comment: Rotherham kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Maxime Biamou scores to make it 1-0 at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
In the minute 12, Goal! Tyler Walker extends Coventry's lead to 2-0.
Joe Mattock for Rotherham has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Coventry with the kick-off.
The away team have replaced Joe Mattock with Daniel Barlaser. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Warne.
Matthew Olosunde is on a sub for Richard Wood for Rotherham.
In the minute 52, At St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium, Matthew Olosunde has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team replace Freddie Ladapo with George Hirst.
Rotherham make their fourth substitution with Kyle Vassell replacing Jamie Lindsay.
In the minute 71, Angus MacDonald (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
It's now 3-0 in Birmingham as Leo Ostigard scores for Coventry.
Amadou Bakayoko is replacing Tyler Walker for the home team.
In the minute 80, Florian Jozefzoon is replacing Michael Smith for the away team.
An attacking Rotherham player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Daniel Barlaser's spot-kick reduces the deficit 3-1.
That's full-time at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium. The final score is 3-1.
